trends: There have been 43 other sightings in Lexington
There were no other sightings in Lexington on or around July 7th 1947
divs: Sighting Details1.5ea.family members were sitting outside due to the summer heat and enjoying the starry night before going to bed. 2.The sudden change in the night sky that we had been watching.Something very different. 3.We more than likely thought it was a military type search light until we saw them coming in order, one after the other. 4.They came very fast at intervals,one after the other.They would go to a certain point,stop abruptly,hesitate briefly,then with tremendous speed they went on at about a 30 degree angle from where they came. 5.We were all amazed after we realized that they could NOT have been search lights because there was no beam from the ground what so ever. 6.The objects left our sight in a couple of seconds due to their speed.
Summary: 5 people saw a number of luminous discs at night on a very clear night.
